headline: Spotify vs. AppLovin: Which Ad-Powered Tech Stock is the Better Buy?

headline: AppLovin Corp.(APP) Drops 10.9% W/W on Misrepresentation Claims
summary: AppLovin Corp. (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the Massive Sell-Offs: These 10 Stocks Shockingly Nosedived. AppLovin dropped its share prices by 10.9 percent week-on-week, ending last Friday at $324.7 versus the $364.49 close on June 13, as investor sentiment was largely dented by Culper Research’s report that it was short on its stock over fears of national […]

headline: AppLovin: This Ad-Tech Juggernaut Is Ready To Shine
summary: AppLovin posts strong Q1 results with 40% YoY growth, expanding into web ads. High FCF & EPS growth drive a 22.5% upside.

headline: AppLovin: Can 80% Margins Survive Outside Gaming?
summary: After divesting its game studios, the company is now a pure AI-driven ad-tech platform chasing a half-trillion-dollar in-app market.
